projects.name: The Cabin - First-Person Horror Game
projects.description: Developing a first-person horror game using Unity and C#, featuring immersive sound design, dynamic lighting, and interactive environments. Implementing physics-based interactions, puzzle mechanics, and AI-driven enemy behavior to enhance gameplay. Utilizing NavMesh AI for intelligent path-finding and optimizing performance with efficient asset management and lighting techniques.

projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot designed to provide mental health support using Gemini AI. Built a secure and empathetic conversational system, and structured a scalable backend for real-time interactions.
